mapper.insert: insert into user_table (u_id, u_status, u_name, u_email, u_pwd, u_gender, u_age, u_pic) values (#{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uGender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user_table set u_status = #{uStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, u_name = #{uName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_email = #{uEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_pwd = #{uPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_gender = #{uGender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, u_age = #{uAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, u_pic = #{uPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select u_id, u_status, u_name, u_email, u_pwd, u_gender, u_age, u_pic from user_table
